name: Christian Filmmakers Collective #05
description: It's been a while, but we're back! Join us on Tuesday 7th November in GlobeSpace on Borough High Street where we'll be hearing from Dai Woolridge and Paul Syrstad. Dai's ambition is to speak what is true, he uses poetry and film to share Biblical truth. Paul is a writer, poet, actor and filmmaker who founded the film company roarlight in 2017.

name: Christian Filmmakers Collective #04
description: We're getting festive! Join Mark and Alasdair from Co-Mission as they talk about the process from creating and promoting a Christmas film. They'll share the some of the lessons learnt from Wrapping Paper and screen their new film for Christmas 2018.

name: Christian Filmmakers Collective #03
description: You're invited to an evening with Vanessa Bailey hearing about her work as a Christian who's an actor, director and producer making short films.

name: Christian Filmmakers Collective #02
description: Tom Cozens will be sharing about his monthly thought-provoking videos with Owl In Space and his thoughtful films produced for various other clients. Followed by an interview with Andy Toovey who'll be sharing his thoughts on winning The Pitch competition, and his experience directing and shooting the short film Only Child.

name: Christian Filmmakers Collective #01
description: Meet with other Christians from across the film and video production world. This evening will be a time to meet, start conversations, and to think and discuss how our faith and skillset come together. We'll also have plenty of time to talk about what happens next in the life of this group.
